name: Hentai Girl Angel
description:
Introduction

Hentai Girl Angel is a puzzle game,you only need to swap the bricks to restore the pictures.
The game support cheating mode and browsing pictures with one hand that you can unlock all pictures in just one minute.
There is no time or star limit in the game, you are supposed to enjoy the relaxing experience.

Characteristics

  • Cheat Mode (F)
  • The gallery can be operated with one hand
  • 100 achievements worthy of being collectible
